title: SureFit Stretch Pique 3 Seat Individual Cushion Sofa Cover (Taupe)
description: Elevate your home decor with the SureFit Stretch Pique Four Piece Sofa Slipcover, a perfect blend of style and functionality. This sofa slipcover with three separate cushion covers is designed to effortlessly transform your living room, adding a touch of style and protection to your favorite sofa. Crafted with precision to fit most sofas measuring 74" to 96" across the outside arm to arm, this sofa and cushion cover set showcases a subtle geometric design. The slightly raised waffle-knit pattern exudes a cozy, inviting feel. The soft two-way stretch fabric, made from 94% polyester and 6% spandex, ensures a snug fit. The four piece form-fit stretch design includes a slipcover with three zippered separate seat cushions, allowing for easy installation and maintenance. Elastic at the bottom perimeter holds the sofa cover securely in place, ensuring a tidy appearance. Plus, it's machine washable, making cleanup a breeze. Not only does this sofa slipcover enhance your living room decor but it also serves as a reliable furniture protector. Designed for use with furniture that has removable seat cushions, it guards against spills, stains, and everyday wear and tear, extending the lifespan of your sofa. Available in our largest collection of colors.
